title: Can anyone tell me what font this logo is?
content:
Can anyone tell me what font this logo for Miami is? Thanks!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20141114053116im_/http:/typophile.com/files/GMCVB_Corp_Logo_BLK_6687.jpg)

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [GMCVB\_Corp\_Logo\_BLK.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20141114053116/http:/typophile.com/files/GMCVB_Corp_Logo_BLK.jpg) | 36.63 KB |
author: Bruiser05

comments.content: Don’t think it’s made from a font.

Too easy to draw. Most likely custom made.

[http://fuggini.blogspot.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20141114053116/http:/fuggini.blogspot.com/ "http://fuggini.blogspot.com")

Do the weights look weird to you Jan?

Michael

yeah well, some guy decided to make his own avant-garde gothic in illustrator with slightly rounded angles.

dr

Thanks for everyone looking at this. I've seen it used in a couple of places, mainly used in nightclub promotions or sexy magazine ads. I like this logo but wasn't sure if it was made or just a type treatment.
